data.oai_dc:dc: File containing genotype data from 12 microsatellite (SSR) loci for 412 individuals from 14 Lolium perenne ssp. multiflorum populations from California formatted for analysis with STRUCTURE software.
Lolium perenne ssp. multiflorum|Italian ryegrass|agricultural weed|herbicide|glyphosate|glyphosate resistance|microsatellite markers
